verbs.description: [ARG0: A group of Republican congressmen] [V: intend] [ARG1: to bring the DOJ to heel on Friday] . And if the price of making Trump happy is the last hope for the rule of law … they made that decision long ago . Within the Republican Party , there ’s no longer any such thing ...
